troubleshooting.title: DITA to CHM Transformation Fails - Compilation Failed

keywords.indexterm: CHM Error HHC5010: Cannot open file
CHM Error HHC5003: Compilation failed while compiling file

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: The DITA to CHM transformation fails with the following error: [exec] HHC5003: Error: Compilation failed while compiling fileName.

cause.title: Cause 1
cause.p: One possible cause for this error is that the processed file does not exist.

steps-informal.p: To solve this issue, fix the file reference before executing the transformation scenario again.

cause.title: Cause 2
cause.p: Another possible cause for this error is that the processed file has a name that contains space characters.

steps-informal.p: To solve the issue, remove any spacing from the file name and run the transformation scenario again.

p.note: It is a good practice to validate the DITA map before executing the transformation scenario. To do so, run the Validate and Check for Completeness action. Depending on the selected options, this action reports errors, such as topics referenced in other topics (but not in the DITA map), broken links, and missing external resources.
